title: Do not pass go
creator_credit: Victorian Film Corporation, Kent Chadwick and Phil de Montingnie
brief_description: A dramatisation of the story of two young people and their confrontation with the law. Set in the streets, in the children’s courts and in the prisons, it shows that Australian welfare systems do not necessarily assist such teenagers. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian Film Corporation, Kent Chadwick and Phil de Montingnie
